attrs.script:
# 
# Adds 1 Machines to Machine Catalog 'Windows 10 Non-persisten 2vCPU 4GB'
# 
# 4/11/2018 10:24 AM
# 

Get-LogSite  -AdminAddress "xd.ntnxlab.local:80"

Start-LogHighLevelOperation  -AdminAddress "xd.ntnxlab.local:80" -Source "Studio" -StartTime "4/11/2018 5:24:43 PM" -Text "Adds 1 Machines to Machine Catalog `'Windows 10 Non-persisten 2vCPU 4GB`'"

Get-AcctIdentityPool  -AdminAddress "xd.ntnxlab.local:80" -IdentityPoolName "Windows 10 Non-persisten 2vCPU 4GB" -MaxRecordCount 2147483647

Get-AcctADAccount  -AdminAddress "xd.ntnxlab.local:80" -IdentityPoolUid "43aebdee-9e31-4b29-90a6-a14c04cb8166" -Lock $False -MaxRecordCount 2147483647 -State "Available"

New-AcctADAccount  -AdminAddress "xd.ntnxlab.local:80" -Count 1 -IdentityPoolUid "43aebdee-9e31-4b29-90a6-a14c04cb8166" -LoggingId "bed7eb28-bfe4-49cb-b770-565e5c701514"

Get-ProvScheme  -AdminAddress "xd.ntnxlab.local:80" -MaxRecordCount 2147483647 -ProvisioningSchemeName "Windows 10 Non-persisten 2vCPU 4GB"

New-ProvVM  -ADAccountName @("NTNXLAB\W10NP-006$","NTNXLAB\W10NP-007$") -AdminAddress "xd.ntnxlab.local:80" -LoggingId "bed7eb28-bfe4-49cb-b770-565e5c701514" -ProvisioningSchemeName "Windows 10 Non-persisten 2vCPU 4GB" -RunAsynchronously

Lock-ProvVM  -AdminAddress "xd.ntnxlab.local:80" -LoggingId "bed7eb28-bfe4-49cb-b770-565e5c701514" -ProvisioningSchemeName "Windows 10 Non-persisten 2vCPU 4GB" -Tag "Brokered" -VMID @("06a89b7b-ee5d-4ee5-9e2e-56b8058ef8ae","91fd5997-7b1f-4c95-a7ec-43be2f813fb7")

New-BrokerMachine  -AdminAddress "xd.ntnxlab.local:80" -CatalogUid 1 -MachineName "S-1-5-21-522781253-3685070400-545697616-1247"

New-BrokerMachine  -AdminAddress "xd.ntnxlab.local:80" -CatalogUid 1 -MachineName "S-1-5-21-522781253-3685070400-545697616-1248"

Stop-LogHighLevelOperation  -AdminAddress "xd.ntnxlab.local:80" -EndTime "4/11/2018 5:24:56 PM" -HighLevelOperationId "bed7eb28-bfe4-49cb-b770-565e5c701514" -IsSuccessful $True

# Script completed successfully
